Jorge Gómez

Data scientist



    I am a full-time Data Science master student at the Eindhoven University of Techcnology (TU/e), in the Netherlands. In the past, I worked as a Software Engineer for infrastructure projects. In this website you will find an extended version of my CV, links to my professional networks, and some personal information that may help you to know me better.
The best way to contact me is via email, but feel free to reach me through your favorite choice.
